item.title: Theia
item.description: はじめに Theiaとは Theiaとは公式ページの説明を借りれば Eclipse Theia is an extensible platform to develop multi-language Cloud & Desktop IDEs with state-of-the-art web technologies. Eclipse Theiaは、最先端のWebテクノロジーを
